projects.title: TriPandoo
projects.description: A personal full-stack application that intelligently generates optimized travel itineraries using AI, real-time location data, and in-app purchases. Designed, architected, and actively developing both the backend and mobile client to deliver a seamless and intuitive travel planning experience.

details.backend: Built a modular and scalable backend using NestJS and TypeScript. Integrated OpenAI and Groq for dynamic, intelligent itinerary generation. Implemented subscription-based monetization using Apple Pay and react-native-iap, with full receipt validation and lifecycle tracking. Utilized Mapbox APIs for geospatial data and location-aware features.
details.mobile: Developed a cross-platform mobile app using React Native and Expo for fast, native-like performance. Created an intuitive, responsive UI to guide users through AI-powered travel planning. Integrated in-app purchases with subscription flows and payment handling.
details.website: Created a fast, SEO-friendly website using Next.js to showcase the app. Designed and implemented responsive pages to communicate features and collect early interest.

projects.title: 4D Audit Tool
projects.description: A tool designed to audit 4D projects and provide actionable insights on security, performance, and best practices. This solution leverages modern frontend technologies alongside AI-driven workflow automation to deliver efficient and reliable project assessments.

details.architecture: Architected and developed the frontend using Next.js and TypeScript for a responsive and user-friendly interface. Designed and automated audit workflows with LangGraph to streamline project assessments.
details.ai: Leveraged CopilotKit to accelerate development through AI-assisted coding. Applied Groq for advanced querying and in-depth analysis of 4D project data.
details.impact: Continuously enhancing and scaling the solution to improve 4D project quality and maintainability.

projects.title: CareerCard
projects.description: A full-scale redesign and redevelopment of an existing digital solution for resource management, covering web, backend, and mobile platforms. The goal was to modernize the architecture, improve performance, and establish a consistent design language across all platforms.

details.design: Designed and implemented a reusable design system to unify the user experience across web and mobile platforms.
details.web: Rebuilt the frontend from scratch using React and modern UI principles with Tailwind CSS for styling.
details.backend: Re-architected and redeveloped the backend using Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and Mongoose for scalable data management.
details.mobile: Rebuilt the mobile application for both iOS and Android using React Native and Expo.
details.quality: Refactored legacy code and delivered new features to improve functionality and maintainability. Conducted thorough code reviews to ensure code quality and alignment with best practices.

projects.title: Lycra
projects.description: A collection of applications and websites featuring a cohesive design system. Contributed to the ongoing development and maintenance of a front-end solution, focusing on building a cohesive design system and enhancing code quality through testing and refactoring.

details.design: Developed and maintained a scalable design system to ensure UI consistency across multiple applications and websites.
details.development: Managed and enhanced the frontend of an existing application built with Twig and JavaScript. Refactored codebase and implemented new features to improve performance and user experience.
details.testing: Wrote comprehensive unit, integration, and end-to-end (E2E) tests using Jest and Cypress. Conducted thorough code reviews to uphold coding standards and best practices.
details.tools: Used Storybook as a centralized platform for component development, testing, and team collaboration.

projects.title: Metacard
projects.description: Creation of a high-performance website with a focus on smooth animations and robust testing. Built a responsive website featuring complex animations optimized to enhance user experience with comprehensive testing coverage.

details.development: Developed a responsive website using Next.js and TypeScript with server-side rendering for optimal performance.
details.animations: Studied, created, and optimized complex animations to enhance user experience and engagement.
details.testing: Wrote thorough unit, integration, and end-to-end (E2E) tests to ensure reliability across all features.
details.quality: Conducted detailed code reviews to maintain code quality and consistency throughout the project.

projects.title: Process Watch
projects.description: An application that watches cloud platform emails. Developed and maintained a full-featured admin web application along with a robust backend API to support core business operations.

details.frontend: Built the admin web app using TypeScript, Create React App (CRA), and styled-components for modular, maintainable styling.
details.backend: Designed and implemented the core REST API with Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and Mongoose to ensure efficient data management and scalability.
details.collaboration: Collaborated closely between frontend and backend to deliver seamless user experiences and reliable data flows.
details.quality: Emphasized clean code practices and maintainability across both frontend and backend stacks.

projects.title: ScoCloud
projects.description: A plugin that runs under Kaseya. Contributed to fullstack development by building backend features and crafting frontend interfaces for an admin web application.

details.backend: Developed backend features using Node.js with the izm.js boilerplate to ensure scalable and maintainable code.
details.frontend: Built user interfaces with React.js and TypeScript for a robust and type-safe frontend experience.
details.admin: Created the admin web app leveraging TypeScript, Create React App (CRA), and styled-components for modular styling and theming.
details.api: Implemented the core REST API with Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and Mongoose to provide reliable data services.

projects.title: VCloud API Connector
projects.description: A tool that permits the use of VCloud API dynamically. Developed a connector/package focused on secure authentication, organizational management, and flexible data center integration.

details.authentication: Implemented authentication features to securely manage user access within the connector.
details.organization: Built functionality to handle organization management supporting multi-tenant use cases.
details.datacenter: Designed seamless data center switching capabilities for improved reliability and flexibility.
details.architecture: Applied Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles using TypeScript to ensure modularity and maintainability.
details.integration: Utilized VMware documentation to align the connector with infrastructure requirements.

projects.title: 4D-CLI
projects.description: A command line interface tool that generates starter templates for new projects. Developed to streamline project setup across multiple platforms.

details.templates: Prepared and managed reusable templates for web, mobile, backend, connector, and service projects.
details.architecture: Built the CLI using TypeScript with a strong focus on Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles for maintainability.
details.cli: Leveraged the Commander library to handle command parsing and user interactions effectively.

projects.title: 4D Connector
projects.description: A tool that permits the use of a 4D database. Designed a connector to simplify interaction with 4D REST capabilities, enabling seamless integration of 4D services into web development and Node.js applications.

details.abstraction: Abstracts and streamlines the use of 4D REST APIs for easier consumption.
details.integration: Facilitates using 4D backend functionalities within modern web and server-side environments.
details.productivity: Enhances developer productivity by providing reusable, easy-to-use interfaces.
details.architecture: Built with TypeScript following OOP principles for maintainability and scalability.

projects.title: MBM Project
projects.description: Church givings management platform. Led the restyling and refactoring of the MBM web and mobile applications to enhance user experience and maintainability.

details.web: Redesigned and restyled the web application using Angular and TypeScript.
details.mobile: Updated the mobile application interface built with Ionic and TypeScript.
details.backend: Developed and maintained the backend API using Node.js to support frontend functionality.

projects.title: GAM Payment
projects.description: An application for paying bills, smartphone resales and performing refills. Developed and maintained key services within the ESB architecture, including billing and smartphone resale platforms.

details.billing: Built and enhanced the bill payment service to ensure secure, reliable transactions.
details.resale: Maintained and improved the smartphone resale service to support seamless resale operations.
details.refill: Contributed to the architectural design of the refill service for scalability and efficiency.
details.integration: Ensured smooth integration of all services within the ESB framework.

projects.title: GAM Monitoring
projects.description: An application for monitoring payment services. Designed and developed a solution to monitor services within a bus ESB architecture, focusing on real-time visibility and management.

details.frontend: Built user interfaces using Angular and TypeScript to provide intuitive monitoring dashboards.
details.backend: Developed backend APIs with Spring Boot to support data collection and service orchestration.
details.integration: Ensured seamless integration within the ESB architecture for efficient service monitoring.
